text: Karl-Otto Apel (; 15 March 1922 – 15 May 2017) was a German philosopher and Professor Emeritus at the University of Frankfurt am Main. He developed a distinctive philosophical approach which he called "transcendental pragmatics" (Transzendentalpragmatik).Andreas Dorschel (ed.), Transzendentalpragmatik, Suhrkamp, Frankfurt am Main 1993. He was known for his works Understanding and Explanation: A Transcendental-Pragmatic Perspective and Theory of Communicative Action. Apel was made a Member of the Academia Europaea in 1989 and a Full Member of the Academia Scientiarum et Artium Europaea in 1993. In 2001, he was awarded the Order of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany. Apel died on 15 May 2017 in Niedernhausen at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== *personal website Category:1922 births Category:2017 deaths Category:German philosophers Category:People from Düsseldorf Category:Academics of Goethe University Frankfurt Category:Members of Academia Europaea
